definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: sword, as weapon of war Ge 48:22 (E), Ju Jdg 7:14, Jdg 7:20, 1Sa 21:9, and so in all periods; two-edged (short) sword [[וְלָהּ שְׁנֵי פֵיâוֹת גּׁמֶד אָרְכָּהּ]] ´[[ח]] Ju Jdg 3:16, cf. [[פִּיּוֹת]] ´[[ח]] Pr 5:4 (in sim.), [[פִּיפִיּוֹת]] ´[[ח]] Ps 149:6; v. also ´[[חוּר ח]] edge of sword Ps 89:44.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: draw the sword ´[[הֵרִיק הח]] Ex 15:9, Le 26:33, Ez Eze 5:2, Eze 5:12, Eze 12:14, Eze 28:7, ´[[הוחיא הח]] Ez Eze 21:8, Eze 21:10, ´[[פתח הח]] Ps 37:14, Ez Eze 21:28, [[נטשׁ]] Is 21:15 (Gr Che [[לטשׁ]] v. infr.); usu. ´[[שׁלף הח]] Nu 22:23, Nu 22:31, Jos 5:13, Ju Jdg 3:22, Jdg 8:10, Jdg 8:20, Jdg 9:54, 1Sa 17:51, 1Sa 31:4 = 1Ch 10:4, 1Ch 21:16, and as characteristic of warriors ´[[שׁׂלֵף ח]] Ju Jdg 20:2, Jdg 20:15, Jdg 20:17, Jdg 20:25, Jdg 20:35, Jdg 20:46, 2Sa 24:9, 2Ki 3:26, 1Ch 21:5, 1Ch 21:5; ´[[וַתִּדְבַּק יׇדוֹ אֶל־הַח]] 2Sa 23:10, ins. also in ‖ 1Ch 11:13 (Dr).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: whet, sharpen the sword ´[[לטשׁ הח]] Ps 7:13 (cf. Is 21:15 supr.), but also [[שׁנן]] De 32:41 cf. Ps 64:4, [[הוּחַדָּה]] Ez Eze 21:14, Eze 21:16.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: put up the sword into the sheath [[אֶל־נְדָנׇהּ]] ´[[הֵשִׁיב הח]] 1Ch 21:27 (sheath of sword is elsewhere [[תַּעַר]] 1Sa 7:51, 2Sa 20:8, Je 47:6, Ez Eze 21:8).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: slay with sword [[הרג]] ´[[בח]] Jos 10:11, Jos 13:22 +; in [[ימותו אנשׁים]] 1Sa 2:33, insert [[בְּחֶרֶב]] before [[אנשׁים]] LXX We Dr; rarely ´[[הכה בח]] Jos 11:10, 2Ki 19:37 = Is 37:38; very oft. ´[[הִכָּה לְפִי־ח]] smite acc. to the mouth of the sword i.e. as the sword can devour (2Sa 2:26, 2Sa 11:25) = without quarter Nu 21:24 (E) De 13:16 a, De 20:13, Jos 11:11, Jos 11:12, Jos 11:14 (all D) Ju Jdg 18:27, Jdg 21:10, 1Ki 10:25, Job 1:15, Job 1:17; also c. [[העיר]] as sole obj. Jos 8:24, Jos 10:28, Jos 10:30, Jos 10:32, Jos 10:35, Jos 10:37, cf. v:Jos 10:39, Jos 19:47, Ju Jdg 1:8, Jdg 1:25, Jdg 20:37, 1Sa 22:19, 1Sa 22:19, 2Sa 15:14; ´[[הרג לפי־ח]] † Ge 34:26 (J); ´[[החרים לפי־ח]] De 13:16 b (incl. [[הָעִיר]] in obj.), Jos 6:21, 1Sa 15:8, ´[[חלשׁ לפי־ח]] † Ex 17:13 (E); ´[[נפל לפי־ח]] Jos 8:24, Ju Jdg 4:16; ´[[לפי־ח]]…´[[וַיׇּהָם י]] Ju Jdg 4:15; —(´[[לפי־ח]] is chiefly in Jos and Ju (Jdg 4:21 t.), in Hexat. only JED; but Jb post-ex.).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: ´[[אכלה הח]] etc., of the sword as devouring:—[[תּאׁכֵל חַרְבִּי בָשָׂר]] De 32:42 (poet.), 2Sa 2:26, 2Sa 11:25, 2Sa 18:8, Is 1:10, Je 2:30, Je 46:10, Je 46:14, Na 2:14.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: slain by sword is ´[[חֲלַל־חִ]] Nu 19:16 (P) and frequently Ez, ´[[חַלְלֵי־ח]] Eze 31:17, Eze 31:18, Eze 32:21, Eze 32:25, Eze 32:28, Eze 32:29, Eze 32:30, Eze 32:32, Eze 35:8 ´[[מְחֻלְלֵי ח]] v:Eze 32:26 < Co ´[[חללי־ח]] (on text of Eze 32:20, Eze 32:22, Eze 32:31 v. Co).

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: ´[[שְׁבֻיוֹת ח]] Ge 31:26 are captives of (taken by) sword.

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: sword frequently agent of ´[[י]] Ju Jdg 7:20, Is 34:6, Je 12:12, Je 47:6 etc.,—so De 28:22, but rd. [[חׂרֶב]] v. sub I. [[חרב]] (cf. on other hand 1Sa 17:47); note esp. Ge 3:24 ´[[לַהַט הח]] [[הַמִּתְהַפֶּכֶת]]; poet. ´[[לַהַכ ח]] Na 3:3, ´[[בְּרַק ח]] De 32:41.

definitions.title: k.
definitions.body: ´[[ח]] fig. of tongue Ps 57:5 cf. Ps 59:8; fig. of violence war, etc., Ge 27:40; in sim. Pr 5:4 (of grievous end of dealings with strange women).

knife [[חֻרִים]] ´[[ח]] flint knives for use in circumcision Jos 5:2, Jos 5:3 (v. We:Skizzen iii, 166); Ez Eze 5:1; Eze 5:2 [[חַדָּה תַּעַר]] ´[[ח]] [[הַגַּלָּבִים]] (acc. to Co use of sword as razor is significant).

of tools used in hewing stone [[חַרְבְּךָ הֵנַפְתָּ עליה]] Ex 20:25; ´[[יִתּׂץ בח]] Ez Eze 26:9, acc. to most = tools, axes, ‘ steel ’ (Co ‘ Eisen ’), but poss. swords as implement ready to hand; 2Ch 34:6 Qr [[בְּחַרְבׂתֵיהֶם]] with their tools; rd. perh. [[בְּחָרְבׂתֵיהֶם]] in their ruins, Be, who comp. Ps 109:10; v. [[חָרְבָּה]] sub II. [[חרב]] (LXX Vulgate om. [[חרב]]).
